media player probably needs a video codec to play the actual video...if it has an error and asks you if you want web help choose that and it takes u to microsoft website ans it shows you the name of the codec u need...copy the name on google and find a free download site...thats it..enjoy:)

Overall good cam from a experienced guy.  Thx for the upload. dont pay to see it in theatres.
